entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
